dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3556982Z] www.clicks18.info is stealing content from my blog and oth
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, March 20, 2007 3:46 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3556982Z] www.clicks18.info is stealing content from my blog and others ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. www.clicks18.info is stealing content from my blog and others Added by system at Tuesday, Mar 20 2007 10:07 am X-MailFrom: jacob.share@shareselectmedia.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Mar 20 10:06:58 2007 Received: (qmail 23913 invoked by alias); 20 Mar 2007 15:06:56 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 23910 invoked from network); 20 Mar 2007 15:06:55 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 20 Mar 2007 15:06:55 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 20 Mar 2007 10:06:54 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 20 Mar 2007 10:06:54 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from jacob.share@shareselectmedia.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HTfvK-00040a-K3 for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 20 Mar 2007 10:06:54 -0500 Received: from cl40.gs01.gridserver.com ([64.13.192.49]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from jacob.share@shareselectmedia.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HTfv6-0007mY-7U for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 20 Mar 2007 10:06:40 -0500 Received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1]:55306 helo=localhost.localdomain) by cl40.gs01.gridserver.com with esmtp (Exim 4.50) id 1HTfv3-0004K1-XQ for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 20 Mar 2007 08:06:37 -0700 Content-Disposition: inline Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8" MIME-Version: 1.0 From: "jacob.share@shareselectmedia.com" To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: www.clicks18.info is stealing content from my blog and others Reply-To: jacob.share@shareselectmedia.com Date: Tue, 20 Mar 2007 08:06:37 -0700 Message-Id: <63979.1174403197@shareselectmedia.com> X-Mailer: AtMail 4.51 - 82.230.82.42 - jacob.share@shareselectmedia.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 20 Mar 2007 15:06:54.0801 (UTC) FILETIME=[65A83410:01C76B01] MIME element (text/html) Hello,
To my dismay, I discovered this morning that a site on your servers has begun stealing some of my blog's content and others. In my case, the site has taken my RSS feed and simply copied an entire post and pasted it to http://www.clicks18.info/Courses.htm (search for the word 'distractions'). They removed my copyright notice but left most of the other links intact, you can compare with my feed here: http://jobmob.co.il/feed/.

Doing a reverse IP lookup after a whois lookup of clicks18.info, it appears that you are hosting the site, which means that clicks18.info is violating your Acceptable Usage Policy in addition to the DMCA.

Please take appropriate action. If you think it useful, I will also submit a DMCA complaint

Sincerely,

----
Jacob Share
CEO, Share Select Media
